ETC Theatre Event ARTThe Alley Theatre presents Art By Ysmina Reza This international comedy sensation chronicles the hilarious events surrounding the purchase of a contemporary painting for a huge amount of money Yasmina Rezas clever comedy ran for over a year at the Comedie des ChampsElysees in Paris and has already garnered the Moliere Award for Best Play Olivier Award for Best Comedy Evening Standard Award for Best New Comedy as well as a Tony and New York Critics Award for Best Play A remarkably wise witty and intelligent comedy ART has touched a universal nerve wrote The New York Times Where The Alley Theatre wwwalleytheatrecom When Saturday October Time pm Ticket prices Gold Circle member nonmember A Seating member nonmember B Seating member nonmember ticket maximum for members Deadline Tuesday October Coordinator Iris Waser X EBb Please email me your responses and questions Make your checks payable to Enron Travel Club

ETC Theatre Event Into The Woods for children over Theatre Under the Starts presents Into The Woods Music and Lyrics by Stephen Sondheim Suggested for children and above TUTS premiere production of the witty musical fairy tale that features all your favorite characters Cinderella and her Prince Little Red Riding Hood and the Wolf Jack the Giantkiller Rapunzel Sleeping Beauty Snow White and a few original characters Sondheims haunting score including the classic Children Will Listen and a twist on some old stories will leave you bewitched Where Arena Theatre Sharpstown wwwtutsorg When December Time pm Ticket prices member nonmember Row DH member nonmember Row T ticket maximum for members Deadline November Coordinator Iris Waser X EBb Please email me your responses and questions Make your checks payable to Enron Travel Club

ETC Theatre Event RomanceRomanceTrying to find out what to do with those outoftown guests for Thanksgiving Well here is your answer Stages Theatre presents RomanceRomance Book and Lyrics by Bary Harman Music by Keith Herrmann This sophisticated musical celebrates courtship love and fidelity in two very different centuries as lovers discover the timeless truths of romantic relationships Act One VIENNA A dashing aristocrat and a fiery young woman unsatisfied with their lackluster love lives take on new identities in hopes of finding true love Under these false pretenses they meet and form an attachment but can their romance survive the truth Act Two THE HAMPTONS Present Day A vacation in the Hamptons seems like the perfect setting for armour for two happilymarried couplesbut will they end up sharing more than a summer home Find out in this uproarious study of the joys and complexities of modern romance This musical received Tony nominations The New York Times calls it smart bubbly and ardent and the New York Post calls it a doubledollop of the romantic spirit Where Stages Theatre wwwstagestheatrecom When Saturday November Time pm Ticket prices member nonmember ticket maximum for members Deadline Wednesday November Coordinator Iris Waser X EBb Please email me your responses and questions Make your checks payable to Enron Travel Club

ETC Theatre Event Cirque due SoleilPLEASE NOTE THAT I NEED HEADCOUNT EXTRA EARLY ON THIS EVENT TUTS presents Cirque du Soleil Dralion For the first time ever performances of this aweinspiring entertainment event which is the toast of major cities in Europe and North America will be offered as part of a theatre series Only the second time Cirque du Soleil has appeared in Houston this will be an allnew show Its called Dralion and it features artists from eight different countries who present a variety of music theatre and dance all in a breathtaking futuristic set in brilliantly colored costumes with a musical score that is an inspired fusion of sounds from East and West Cirque du Soleil is a onceinalifetime theatrical opportunity that must be seen to be believed and enjoyed Where Their tent will be pitched I believe in front of George R Brown When Sunday January Time pm Ticket prices Members NonMembers ticket maximum for members Deadline I need to get a close tentative headcount with payment by October Coordinator Iris Waser X EBb Please email me your responses and questions Make your checks payable to Enron Travel Club
ETC Theatre Event The Lion KingPlease see attached announcement on The Lion King at Jones Hall If interested in purchasing tickets please contact Margaret Doucette at ext

ETC Theatre Event Little Witch of WichitaSPECIAL HALLOWEEN PARTY PERFORMANCE Get ready for Halloween with a Costume Extravaganza party following the oclock performance There will be a costume parade maskmaking facepainting and other crafts Learn more about the art of theatrical costuming and meet the actors All of this included in the price of the tickets early Stages presents Little Witch of Wichita Book By Martin Brown Music by Kevin Kaufman Lyrics by Sandy Sherman In this bewitching modern musical Little Witch she prefers Katrina longs for the respect of her peers and tries to impress them by accepting the challenge of finding the final ingredients for the Halloween Happening stew Little Witchs adventures not only bring her new friends including Armando a Mayorcan mambo mouse and the shy PeekaBoo Tree but also teach her that selfrespect starts on the inside Where Stages Theatre wwwstagestheatrecom When Saturday October Time pm Ticket prices member nonmember ticket maximum for members Deadline Thursday October Coordinator Iris Waser X EBb Please email me your responses and questions Make your checks payable to Enron Travel Club
ETC Event Vince Gill Amy GrantPlease see attachment for A Christmas to Remember with Vince Gill Amy Grant Please contact Margaret Doucette at ext

ETC Theatre Event The Diary of Anne FrankMain Street Theatre presents The Diary of Anne Frank Newly Adapted by Wendy Kesselman Recommended for th grade up On July Anne Frank and her family were forced into hiding in a secret annex She took her most valuable possession with her a small red and white plaid diary For over two years Anne wrote about her life in hiding the war and her hopes for the future This new adaptation retells the harrowing true story of two families forced to hide from the world three adolescents struggling to find their own identities with WWII raging around them and the courageous people who risked their lives to protect their very existence Annes father was the only survivor of the Frank family from the concentration camps of WWII He edited her diary before her story was previously told This adaptation is Anne Franks unedited diary Where Main Street Theatre Montrose Blvd at Chelsea Market When Sunday November Time pm Ticket prices Member Adult Child under NonMember Adult Child under children must be years old to attend Deadline Monday October Coordinator Iris Waser X EBb Please email me your responses and questions Make your checks payable to Enron Travel Club
ETC Theatre Events Proof and South PacificPlease view the following events If interested please contact Margaret Doucette at ext Thank you

ETC Officer Election NoticeEnron Travel Club Officer Election Notice Please be advised that we will have election of officers at our regularly scheduled meeting scheduled for Tuesday November If you know someone that you would like to nominate for a position please forward the names to Dianne Langeland by November th She will contact the nominees to see if heshe is willing to serve and notify the membership of the nominees prior to the meeting Thanks

ETC Theatre Event The Seventh Annual Childrens FestivalCynthia Woods Mitchell Pavillion presents The Seventh Annual Childrens Festival Once again The Pavillion hosts an aweinspiring extravaganza of live music theater storytelling dance games arts and crafts pantomime comedy audience participation and more The Childrens Festival showcases awardwinning childrens performers who use their unique talents not only for entertaining but also for nurturing So kids find themselves having fun and learning all kinds of fascinating things about people and the world around them The Festival is grownupfriendly too Your admission at the entrance covers every show and activity Bring your picnic lunch to enjoy on the hillside Plus the good times and giggles are downright infectious Where Cynthia Woods Mitchell Pavillion The Woodlands When Saturday October or Sunday October Your tickets allows admission for one of these two days Time Saturday Sunday Ticket prices member or nonmember no ticket limit Deadline Monday October Coordinator Iris Waser X EBb Please email me your responses and questions Make your checks payable to Enron Travel Club
ETC Event SchlitterbahnAll the Schlitterbahn tickets have been sold and we will NOT be purchasing any more Thanks Ruth

ETC Event SPACE CENTER HOUSTONFYI Rose just received more tickets from Space Center please note that the cost went up for children tickets only Event Coordinator Rose Rivera x AC Enron Travel Club Members adult child Nonmember Price adult child Location Space Center Houston is located at Nasa Rd Houston TX approximately miles south of downtown Houston in the NASAClear Lake area Phone Welcome to Space Center Houston the Official Visitor center of NASAs Johnson Space Center The Center is owned and operated by the Manned Space Flight Education Foundation Inc and is not federally funded Applaud the accomplishments of NASA and the American manned space flight program at Space Center Houston You will relive the past achievements of the space program and witness todays history in the making Everything you see in the facility is realistic Space Center Houstons creators kept in close contact with NASA to ensure the most accurate experience Each attraction is selfguided so you can spend as much time or as little time in each areas as desired Most guests spend four to six hours in the Center

ETC Theatre Event Glass MenagerieThe Alley Theatre presents Glass Menagerie By Tennessee Williams A revival of one of the greatest plays of the American theatre featuring Tony Awardwinner Elizabeth Ashley as Amanda Wingfield a faded Southern belle who lives on the memories of her gentlemen callers and the desire to find happiness and good fortune for her children Where The Alley Theatre wwwalleytheatrecom When Saturday September Time pm Ticket prices Member prices Gold Circle A seating B seating ticket maximum for members NonMember prices Gold Circle A seating B seating Deadline August Coordinator Iris Waser X EBb Please email me your responses and questions Make your checks payable to Enron Travel Club Iris S Waser X EB b
ETC Museum of Fine Arts Membership DrivePlease see attached If you have any questions please call Margaret Doucette Thanks

ETC Event SchlitterbahnGOOD NEWS I contacted Schlitterbahn about a twoday ticket for next year and they told me that it is not well advertised but if you want a secondday ticket all you have to do is go to the admissions booth show them your ticket for the current day or arm band and you will be able to purchase the secondday ticket for Adult Child This is the only way you can get a reduced ticket for the second day Get the secondday ticket as you go in because the admission booth closes at pm That is not all the secondday ticket can be used anytime it does not have to be used the next day Ruth Mann Enron Transportation Services Company EB

ETC Event Moody GardensTickets to Moody Gardens in Galveston are available Includes entry into park aquarium and attractions of your choiceIMAX Rain Forest etc Tickets are valid through July Enron Travel Club Members each NonMembers each Contact Dianne Langeland in Three Allen Center at x Contact Sylvia Hu in Enron Building at x

ETC Theatre Event Last Call Smokey Joes CafeHELP We have several people who want to attend but not enough for a full fledged group discount This should really be a foot stomping good time Come on along Let me know by Tuesday at Noon TUTS presents SMOKEY JOES CAFE with Gladys Knight Rock n Roll Hall of Famer Gladys Knight stars in the seven time Tony Awardnominated and Grammy Awardwinning musical Smokey Joes Cafe Gladys Knight played to sold out audiences on Broadway in the spring and summer of She now returns to the stage for a special limited engagement performing in the songanddance celebration that features every great hit of the s and s Hound Dog Love Potion Stand By Me Yakety Yak There Goes My Baby One Broadway and Jailhouse Rock Where Wortham Theatre wwwtutscom When Sunday August th Time pm Ticket prices member member nonmember member ticket maximum for members Deadline Tuesday Coordinator Iris Waser X EBb Iris S Waser X EB b

ETC Theatre Event Into the WoodsDeadline Thursday th I know most of us are not in the mood to spend unnecessarily but I wanted to give everyone one more opportunity to go We have some who want to but not enough for a group Thanks Special Note Leslie Uggams will be playing the Witch Theatre Under the Stars presents Into The Woods Music and Lyrics by Stephen Sondheim Suggested for children and above TUTS premiere production of the witty musical fairy tale that features all your favorite characters Cinderella and her Prince Little Red Riding Hood and the Wolf Jack the Giantkiller Rapunzel Sleeping Beauty Snow White and a few original characters Sondheims haunting score including the classic Children Will Listen and a twist on some old stories will leave you bewitched Where Arena Theatre Sharpstown wwwtutsorg When December Time pm Ticket prices member nonmember Row DH member nonmember Row T ticket maximum for members Deadline November Coordinator Iris Waser X EBb Please email me your responses and questions Make your checks payable to Enron Travel Club

ETC Community Service ProjectHi everybody Consider the below mentioned activity for volunteering this Holiday season Just go to the website indicated below to sign up SNAP is a great organization They are devoted to curbing the animal population by advocating spayneutering Check them out and sign up Thanks Iris Waser X Wrap It Up with SNAP SNAPs volunteer elves will again be taking over bookstores near you just in time for the holidays Barnes and Noble Stores as well as Borders Books provide the paper We provide the smiles and paper cuts Not too many paper cuts Here we go again wrapping gifts for holiday shoppers at selected locations all over Houston Calling all hands as all shifts are open to wrap gifts for tips And do we mean tips Past experiences have earned SNAP as much as in a single weekend at one store Three to four hour shifts ensure that this volunteer opportunity wont spoil your holiday cheer In addition volunteers will receive a FREE We Wrap for Tips tshirt For store locations and times to signup online go to wwwsnaptxorgvolunteergiftwrapping If wrapping is not your bag then you can help by donating bows and ribbons The prettier the packagesthe better the tips Just drop them off at the Wellness Clinic and we will make those presents beautiful for the animals Shelly BingleCoffman Director of Volunteer Services
